timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: The stock market will close above 5000 by market close today
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Market close time varies by timezone and market (4:00 PM EST for NYSE)
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should interpret as 4:00 PM Eastern Time, convert to user's local timezone
Should pick a specific morning time (e.g., 9:00 AM) for verification

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: The meeting will start at midnight
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Midnight ambiguity - start or end of day?
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should clarify as 12:00 AM (00:00) and specify which day

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: Sarah will call me back this evening
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Subjective time range - evening varies by person/season
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should pick specific evening time (e.g., 7:00 PM) in user's timezone

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: The package will arrive before noon tomorrow
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should set verification for 12:00 PM tomorrow in user's timezone

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: Bitcoin will hit $100k by end of business day
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Business day varies by timezone and industry
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should interpret as 5:00 PM local time on current business day

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: The sunrise will be beautiful at 6:30 AM
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should set verification for exactly 6:30 AM in user's timezone

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: My flight will be delayed past its 11:45 PM departure time
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Specific time with 'past' - when to verify?
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should set verification slightly after 11:45 PM (e.g., 11:50 PM)

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: The restaurant will be busy during lunch rush
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Time range rather than specific time
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should pick peak lunch time (e.g., 12:30 PM) for verification

timezone_edge_case_tests.prompt: I'll finish this project by the end of the week
timezone_edge_case_tests.challenge: Week boundary ambiguity - Friday 5 PM? Sunday midnight?
timezone_edge_case_tests.expected_behavior: Should clarify as Friday 5:00 PM or Sunday 11:59 PM in user's timezone

test_metadata.purpose: Test timezone conversion and relative time interpretation edge cases
test_metadata.notes: Each test should be run individually and results analyzed for correct timezone handling and time interpretation
